recipe.title: Confectioners' Glaze

meta.note: This is the thin glaze that is used to coat donuts.

steps.step: Beat ingredients together until a smooth glaze forms.
Add small amounts extra milk if needed to yield a glaze that flows but isn't too thin.

recipe.serving: Warm glaze slightly over hot water to increase fluidity. Dip pastries into glaze, or pour over pastry, and allow to dry to a thin shell.
